short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to scrape and export emails from web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly manage and export your email lists with Email-Exporter, a powerful and intuitive browser extension designed to streamline your email handling tasks. Perfect for professionals, marketers, and anyone who needs to organize and export email data quickly and efficiently.

*Key Features:*

~Comprehensive Email History: View all your scraped emails in the 'All Emails' tab, complete with a total email count.

~Domain Filtering: Easily filter emails by domain (e.g., gmail.com, outlook.com, yahoo.com, hotmail.com) to find exactly what you need.

~Flexible Export Options: Export your email lists in various formats including XLS, CSV, and TXT for seamless integration with your favorite tools.

~Email Validation: Ensure the accuracy of your email data with built-in email validation.

~Duplicate Merging: Automatically merge duplicate entries to keep your data clean and organized.

~Efficient Management: Copy all emails with a single click, clear the list when needed, and enjoy a clean and organized interface.

~User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface that makes exporting emails a breeze.

~Dynamic Data Display: View your email data dynamically before exporting to ensure accuracy and completeness.

~Google Search URLs: Generate Google search URLs with pagination options for advanced email scraping tasks.

~Telegram Integration: Send newly scraped emails directly to your Telegram bot for instant notifications and streamlined workflow.
